original_text: In the light of the king's countenance is life; and his favour is as a cloud of the latter rain.
korean_text: 왕의 희색은 생명을 뜻하나니 그의 은택이 늦은 비를 내리는 구름과 같으니라

sentences.original_text: In the light of the king's countenance is life
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 얼굴 빛 속에 생명이 있고

sentences.original_text: and his favour is as a cloud of the latter rain
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 호의는 늦은 비의 구름과 같으니라
